resources.string:
Fast\&easy notepad that allows you to make and organize your everyday notes, including setting reminders and getting notifications. 
 In order to use all app's features you should grant some permissions: 
 1. To ignore battery optimization. 
 2. To use camera. 
 3. To use microphone. 
 4. To use internal storage. 
 Although you have a choice not to give those permissions, you are strongly advised to grant them for proper functioning of this app.
